meanings.sent1: The unboxed toy was ready to play with.
meanings.sent2: I prefer unboxed items because they are easier to access.
meanings.sent3: The unboxed gift revealed its contents immediately.
meanings.sent5: The unboxed puzzle pieces were scattered across the table.

meanings.sent1: She unboxed the new shoes and tried them on.
meanings.sent2: Please unboxed the fragile items carefully.
meanings.sent3: He unboxed the surprise package with excitement.
meanings.sent4: They unboxed their emotions and shared them openly.
meanings.sent5: The magician unboxed a rabbit from the hat, surprising everyone.
